row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) > 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 3)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 6)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 15)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 7)
row_desc: Queen has at least one mini challenge win.
Queen has at least four lip sync wins.
Queen has at least three mini challenge wins.
